review: The Fire stick is easy to setup, use and is responsive.  However, the content is very disappointing.  Even with a Prime membership (and Netflix), most TV shows and Movies cost quite a bit for rental and purchase.  I was also disappointed that access to the internet media is more challenging.  You have to download an "app" to Youtube for instance in order to what media there.  However, I am a member of other media sites, and I cannot access their media since they do not have an "app."
author: Amazon Customer

review: I pre-ordered 2 units and 6 months after I received them, they both stopped working.  Amazon is replacing both units, but they say they are only warranteed for 1 year.  If yours stops working, make sure you request a replacement before your year is up!
author: Jeannine S.

review: Worked for a few days then lost connection. Tried to reconnect and "no go". Wondered when I would have problems with it since it would get very warm, almost hot. Also the remote started to jump several "lines" off and on. I found out that problem by reading the reviews after the fact.Anyway, Amazon is EXCELLENT taking back a defective item. Sent it back and ordered a new one which won't be available until the middle of February. Hopefully the new batch has had the problems corrected.
